By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, he said." It breaks faith with a decades-long bipartisan compromise. And according to medical experts, your agenda risks the health and the lives of women, Barbara Boxer ( D-Calif.) said at a Capitol news conference.
